DOC.brief_title: Contingency Management Chronic Recidivist Alcohol-Dependent Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate efficacy prize contingency management ( CM ) reduce in-patient detoxification service chronic recidivist alcohol-dependent patient . 116 alcohol-dependent patient receive 4 alcohol detoxification calendar year randomly assign one two 6-month treatment condition : standard case management treatment , standard case management treatment plus CM . In CM condition , patient earn chance win prize submit negative breath sample comply step toward treatment goal , attend outpatient substance abuse treatment service , attend appointment low income housing program , comply outpatient psychiatric treatment . Treatment service receive , alcohol drug use , psychosocial functioning , HIV risk behavior measure pre-treatment month 1 , 3 , 6 ( post-treatment ) , follow-ups schedule 9 , 12 , 18 month intake .
DOC.criteria: age 18 year old Four inpatient alcohol detoxification previous 12 month current diagnosis DSMIV alcohol dependence
